last_episode_to_air.name: Intertwined
last_episode_to_air.overview: A man and woman are found lying in blood on the sidewalk outside the Cecil Hotel, and, to investigators, it looks as though they both fell or were pushed out of a ninth-floor window.

name: Horror at the Cecil Hotel
overview: Not long after the Cecil Hotel in Los Angeles opened in 1924, a guest committed suicide in one of its rooms, beginning a decades-long string of murders, suicides or otherwise unexplained ...

episodes.name: Room 1402
episodes.overview: L.A.'s infamous Cecil Hotel has seen its fair share of death. But few know it housed some of the most violent killers. While staying at The Cecil, one intrepid journalist is hot on the trail of L.A.'s latest murderer, resident Richard Ramirez.

episodes.name: The Girl in the Water Tank
episodes.overview: Canadian tourist Elisa Lam goes missing after checking into the Cecil Hotel, becoming the latest victim in a long line of murders, suicides and unexplained deaths at Los Angeles' most notorious hotel.

episodes.name: Intertwined
episodes.overview: A man and woman are found lying in blood on the sidewalk outside the Cecil Hotel, and, to investigators, it looks as though they both fell or were pushed out of a ninth-floor window.
